ErrorCode.title: ErrorCode
ErrorCode.description: The API data type ErrorCode is a JSON String of four characters, consisting of digits only. Negative numbers are not allowed. A leading zero is not allowed. Each error code in the API is a four-digit number, for example, 1234, where the first number (1 in the example) represents the high-level error category, the second number (2 in the example) represents the low-level error category, and the last two numbers (34 in the example) represents the specific error.
